I am a fourth year PhD student in the Department of Agriculture and Applied Economics at the University of Georgia, Athens.

Prior to coming to Athens, I was working with a bank in India as Risk Analyst

My interest are: Environmental Economics, Natural Resource Economics, Data Analysis, Geographic Information System (GIS) and Geospatial Artificial Intelligence.
